title: 17oz Stainless Steel Tumbler
text: Take your beverage on the go with this 17oz Stainless Tumbler. Details -BPA-free, double-wall, vacuum-insulated 18/8 stainless steel with sweatproof design. -Leakproof plastic lid with inner seal. -Won't retain odors or flavors. -Passivated interior for corrosion protection. -Nylon carry strap. -Keeps drinks hot for up to eight hours or cold for 24 hours. -Fits most auto cup holders. -Hand wash recommended, (lid is top rack dishwasher safe). -Do not microwave. -Holds 17 oz. -Gift Boxed. -Import. Laser Engraving. Matte Navy.
